decks.notes: The deck focuses on building a strong board presence quickly by playing low-cost aggressive creatures like Cryptbreaker, Dread Wanderer, and Metallic Mimic. This is supported by other cards like Relentless Dead, Lord of the Accursed, and Diregraf Colossus which enhance the zombies on the battlefield. Dark Salvation can generate additional zombie tokens, while Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness provide removal options. Liliana's Mastery provides a power boost to the creatures, and Westvale Abbey can be used to create a powerful flying threat. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of zombies.

This deck focuses on utilizing Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck includes energy-generating cards like Rogue Refiner and Whirler Virtuoso to power the Marvel and trigger its ability to spin for a big creature. Cards like Glimmer of Genius help find the Marvel or necessary pieces, while control elements like Censor and Dissenter's Deliverance help protect the combo. The deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm opponents with massive threats while maintaining board control and card advantage.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence by playing efficient creatures like Walking Ballista, Longtusk Cub, and Rishkar, Peema Renegade. The deck aims to utilize synergies with Winding Constrictor to bolster the power of its creatures and generate card advantage with Glint-Sleeve Siphoner. Removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness help to clear the way for attacking with aggressive threats like Bone Picker and Heart of Kiran. The mana base is designed to support a consistent curve of creatures while also providing access to both green and black mana sources.

The deck focuses on utilizing energy-generating cards to power up Aetherworks Marvel, allowing the player to cheat out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards for card draw and removal to control the board while ramping up to play the big threats. The game plan centers around assembling the Marvel combo quickly to overwhelm the opponent with high-powered creatures and potentially end the game in just a few turns.

The deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly with cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether, enabling the player to activate Aetherworks Marvel and cast powerful Marvel targets like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides additional ramp and removal options, while cards like Rogue Refiner and Whirler Virtuoso help to control the board and generate more energy. The goal is to hit Aetherworks Marvel as quickly as possible to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and close out the game before they can react.

The deck focuses on generating energy through spells like Attune with Aether and Harnessed Lightning to power up Aetherworks Marvel, which can then be used to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes card draw and control elements with Rogue Refiner, Censor, and Glimmer of Genius. Whirler Virtuoso provides additional energy generation and can create Thopter tokens for defense or offense. The inclusion of Torrential Gearhulk gives the deck a backup plan for casting instant spells from the graveyard.

The focus of this deck is to quickly swarm the board with efficient creatures, bolstered by lords and token generators, to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing a combination of low-cost creatures, removal spells, and anthem effects, this deck aims to take control of the battlefield and push for victory as quickly as possible. The inclusion of Westvale Abbey provides additional reach and a potential game-ending threat. With a solid mana base and a streamlined strategy, this Mono Black Aggro deck is designed to apply continuous pressure and outpace the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a board of aggressive creatures, powered by the synergy between zombies and Lord of the Accursed. With a mix of early game aggression and removal spells like Fatal Push and Anguished Unmaking, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of Liliana's Mastery provides a significant boost to your board presence, while Dark Salvation can be a versatile removal or creature-creation spell. The mana base is designed for consistency, with Concealed Courtyard and Shambling Vent providing the necessary colors for casting your spells on curve.

The deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly to play Aetherworks Marvel and spin for Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, providing a powerful win condition. It utilizes cards like Attune with Aether and Harnessed Lightning to generate energy efficiently, while also including counterspells like Censor to protect the combo. Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner provide additional value and board presence. The deck aims to control the game early on before dropping a big threat like Ulamog to quickly close out the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up energy using cards like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit, and then utilize Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Whirler Virtuoso for additional value and protection. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with big threats while generating additional value through card draw and removal spells.

The deck focuses on ramping up energy with cards like Attune with Aether and Harnessed Lightning to fuel Aetherworks Marvel. The goal is to get Aetherworks Marvel onto the battlefield in order to cheat out big win conditions like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards like Glimmer of Genius and Anticipate for card selection and draw power, while cards like Fumigate provide board control. Nissa's Renewal helps ramp up the mana base for casting high-cost spells. The deck's main strategy revolves around utilizing Aetherworks Marvel to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the board through counterspells and removal spells, while generating card advantage. By using cards like Torrential Gearhulk and Glimmer of Genius, the player can outvalue their opponent and maintain control of the game. The deck aims to stall the game out until it can find its win conditions, such as Torrential Gearhulk or Pull from Tomorrow. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the player can secure victory through card advantage and powerful threats.

The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to quickly put pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger while using powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran to deal damage. The deck also utilizes removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to control the board. Additionally, cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provide the deck with resilience and versatility. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and consistent offense, while maintaining some level of control and protection.

This deck focuses on aggressive play by utilizing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, supported by removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Chandra, Torch of Defiance to generate value and pressure the opponent. With a strong vehicle package including Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan, along with good mana fixing and lands, this deck aims to curve out quickly, apply pressure, and synergize well to overwhelm the opponent in a fast-paced fashion.

The deck aims to ramp up energy quickly using cards like Servant of the Conduit and Aetherworks Marvel to bring out big threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. It also utilizes cards like Liliana, Death's Majesty and Ishkanah, Grafwidow for control and defense. The main focus is to efficiently generate and utilize energy to power out game-changing creatures and spells, while also having removal and recursion options to maintain board presence and control. The deck's synergy and balance of offense and defense make it a formidable opponent in Standard 1 vs 1 matches.

The deck focuses on generating energy efficiently through cards like Rogue Refiner and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot, aiming to quickly ramp into Aetherworks Marvel. Once Marvel hits the battlefield, the player can use its ability to cheat powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog into play. The deck also includes disruption with counterspells like Censor and removal like Harnessed Lightning to control the board until the player can assemble their combo pieces. The key strategy is to consistently hit Marvel activations to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with fast, aggressive creatures like Dread Wanderer and Cryptbreaker, supported by powerful tribal synergies with cards like Metallic Mimic and Lord of the Accursed. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a swarm of zombies while also having removal options like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the board. Liliana's Mastery provides a strong finisher and Westvale Abbey can help close out games. Overall, the strategy revolves around creating a fast, efficient mono-black aggro deck.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive creatures from the Mono Black Aggro archetype. By utilizing cards like Metallic Mimic and Lord of the Accursed to boost the strength of your Zombie creatures, combined with removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to maintain board control, the main objective is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. The inclusion of cards like Liliana's Mastery and Cryptbreaker help to create additional value and card advantage, allowing the deck to maintain pressure and outpace the opponent.

This deck focuses on flooding the board with efficient black creatures that work well together, utilizing cards like Cryptbreaker and Diregraf Colossus to generate advantage and pressure the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the opponent's board. With Lord of the Accursed and Metallic Mimic boosting the team, and Liliana's Mastery offering a powerful finisher, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently, ultimately securing victory through aggressive plays and strategic resource management.

The main focus of this deck is to establish a board presence quickly and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. The deck includes low-cost, efficient creatures such as Dread Wanderer and Relentless Dead, supported by spells like Dark Salvation and Grasp of Darkness to remove blockers and maintain board control. Metallic Mimic and Diregraf Colossus help to boost the power of the zombie creature theme, while Liliana's Mastery provides additional token generation and Lord of the Accursed offers buffs to the team. Westvale Abbey serves as a win condition if the game goes long.

The main concept of this Temur Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures like Bristling Hydra, Elder Deep-Fiend, and Glorybringer while generating additional energy with cards like Servant of the Conduit and Whirler Virtuoso. Attune with Aether and Harnessed Lightning provide mana fixing and removal to keep the pressure on. The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy that seeks to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize, using the synergy between energy generation and powerful threats to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board by utilizing powerful creatures like Rhonas the Indomitable, Hazoret the Fervent, and Glorybringer, while also using removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to eliminate threats. The deck also focuses on energy generation with cards like Greenbelt Rampager and Voltaic Brawler, and uses cards like Blooming Marsh and Aether Hub to ensure consistent mana production. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of strong creatures, removal, and efficient mana usage.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up energy using Aetherworks Marvel and Servant of the Conduit, while also controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Ishkanah, Grafwidow. The deck aims to cheat out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Demon of Dark Schemes using Marvel's ability to dig for them. Liliana, Death's Majesty helps to reanimate creatures and provide additional value. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around assembling the Marvel combo and overwhelming the opponent with big threats.

The deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly to cheat out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger using Aetherworks Marvel. Utilizing efficient energy producers like Servant of the Conduit and Whirler Virtuoso, the deck aims to generate enough energy to activate Aetherworks Marvel and cast game-winning threats ahead of curve. Chandra, Flamecaller provides board control and additional win conditions, while Rogue Refiner provides card advantage. The deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with big threats early in the game, demanding quick answers for survival.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly develop a board presence with aggressive creatures like Grim Flayer, Winding Constrictor, and Tireless Tracker, while utilizing cards like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to generate additional value and buff them up. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Never // Return to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is focused on providing both green and black mana sources to support the Golgari color combination.

The Golgari Aggro deck focuses on generating and maximizing +1/+1 counters through cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade. It also utilizes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the board. Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Glint-Sleeve Siphoner provide additional support and card advantage, while Greenbelt Rampager and Walking Ballista serve as flexible threats. The deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent while maintaining board presence and generating value through its synergy with +1/+1 counters.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, supported by powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration. The key strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain tempo by using cards like Heart of Kiran and Archangel Avacyn to control the board while dealing direct damage. The mana base is designed to provide consistent colors for spells and enable the use of Aether Hub for additional resources.

The main focus of this Mardu Aggro deck is to establish early board presence with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Thraben Inspector, backed up by removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to clear the way for attacks. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Heart of Kiran provide additional threats and ways to close out the game quickly. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Heretic Cathar and Archangel Avacyn to disrupt opponents' strategies. With a balance of aggression and disruption, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victories.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and using powerful instant removal spells. The key strategy is to play low-cost creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist early on to apply pressure, while also utilizing cards like Heart of Kiran as a strong flying threat. The inclusion of Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Pia Nalaar provides additional utility and resilience. Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push serve as efficient removal options to clear the opponent's board and secure victories.

This deck focuses on aggressive play, utilizing a mix of creatures and removal spells to quickly overpower the opponent. The key strategy involves playing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger to apply pressure early on, while also using spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to remove threats. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional creature support, while Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester offer flying threats. The deck also includes cards like Walking Ballista and Cut / Ribbons for added versatility and reach. The mana base ensures consistent access to the deck's colors for optimal performance.

This deck focuses on aggressive play by utilizing efficient creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. The key strategy is to establish early board presence with cards like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, while using powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar to generate additional threats. Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push provide removal options to clear the way for attacks, while cards like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester help to maintain a strong board presence. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to the deck's diverse color requirements.

This deck focuses on aggression and utilizing powerful cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Heart of Kiran to quickly overrun the opponent. It also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Heretic Cathar and Fatal Push to control the board. The deck has a good balance of creatures, removal spells, and planeswalkers to maintain pressure on the opponent while maintaining a strong board presence. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Walking Ballista and Cut / Ribbons provide flexible options for dealing with a variety of threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to control the opponent's board. Furthermore, the deck utilizes vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan to provide additional threats and evasion. The inclusion of Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Archangel Avacyn provides both additional threats and protection for your creatures, making it a well-rounded aggressive deck with a strong curve.

The main focus of this Aggro Mardu deck is to apply early pressure on the opponent by playing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, while also using powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar to create threats. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to deal with opposing creatures. The strong mana base allows for consistent casting of spells and utilizing powerful artifacts like Heart of Kiran. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a mix of aggressive creatures and removal.

The main idea of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures and vehicles to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. By featuring cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Heart of Kiran, the deck aims to consistently put threats on the board and maintain board presence. Other cards like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push provide removal options to clear the opponent's creatures and maintain control of the game. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy while also providing flexibility in casting spells of different colors.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on using low-cost, aggressive creatures like Scrapheap Scrounger, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Veteran Motorist to quickly pressure opponents. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Archangel Avacyn provide additional threats and board control. Unlicensed Disintegration is used as removal along with Fatal Push and Declaration in Stone. Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan offer additional ways to attack and crew, while Aether Hub helps fix mana. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with early aggression and efficient creature combat.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing powerful creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Heart of Kiran are key components of the deck, providing strong board presence and evasion. With a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration, as well as versatile threats like Archangel Avacyn and Pia Nalaar, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory quickly. The mana base is designed to support a smooth curve and ensure consistent aggression.

This deck focuses on ramping up energy with cards like Attune with Aether and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot to quickly get Aetherworks Marvel onto the battlefield. Once Marvel is in play, the goal is to activate its ability to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger for a game-ending combo. Control elements like Censor and Cast Out help protect the combo pieces while cards like Glimmer of Genius and Nissa's Renewal provide card advantage and additional resources. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize Aetherworks Marvel to cheat powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger into play quickly, overwhelming the opponent with big threats. The deck includes cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether to ramp up energy quickly and enable the Marvel activation. In addition, the deck includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Ishkanah, Grafwidow to deal with opposing threats while setting up the combo. The overall strategy is to efficiently generate energy and control the board until the combo can be assembled for a game-winning play.

The deck aims to quickly ramp up energy counters using cards like Attune with Aether and Aether Hub to cast Aetherworks Marvel, enabling the player to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner for additional energy generation and card advantage. Utilizing efficient removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Magma Spray, the deck aims to control the board until it can assemble the Marvel combo and overwhelm the opponent with massive threats.

The deck revolves around utilizing energy resources to power up Aetherworks Marvel and bring out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. It also includes various tools to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy, such as counterspells and artifact removal. The goal is to efficiently generate energy, activate Aetherworks Marvel, and overwhelm the opponent with big threats. This deck focuses on creating explosive turns and leveraging the synergy between energy generation, card draw, and powerful creatures to outmaneuver the opponent.

The deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly and efficiently to cast Aetherworks Marvel and cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. Utilizing energy generation cards like Rogue Refiner and Whirler Virtuoso, the deck aims to hit Marvel as soon as possible to put immense pressure on the opponent. Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides additional ramp and removal options, while Glorybringer and Tireless Tracker provide additional threats. The deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with big plays and explosive turns, utilizing a combo strategy to win games quickly.

The deck is focused on generating energy tokens and using them to power up Aetherworks Marvel, which allows the player to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Whirler Virtuoso to help control the board and provide additional value. The goal is to quickly ramp up energy production and use Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out big threats, overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures and versatile planeswalker abilities.

The deck revolves around utilizing energy resources to quickly ramp into powerful cards like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger through Aetherworks Marvel. Cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Rogue Refiner provide additional card advantage and support for the strategy. The deck also includes ways to generate energy quickly with cards like Servant of the Conduit and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot. By efficiently managing resources and timing, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its potent creatures and spells, making it a formidable combo deck in Standard 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly using cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether, in order to play Aetherworks Marvel as soon as possible. Once Aetherworks Marvel is on the battlefield, the goal is to activate its ability as many times as possible to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes tools for removal and card draw to control the board and maintain resources. Ultimately, the key strategy is to overwhelm opponents with big threats early on.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble and activate Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. By using cards like Attune with Aether and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot to ramp up energy, as well as card draw spells like Glimmer of Genius, the deck can efficiently find and play its key combo pieces. With a mix of removal spells and creature threats, the deck aims to control the board and overwhelm opponents with its powerful late-game threats.

The core principle of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy focused on creatures with synergy and token generation. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Cryptbreaker and Dread Wanderer, alongside powerful support cards like Dark Salvation and Liliana's Mastery, this Mono Black Aggro deck aims to rapidly build a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. With a strong emphasis on generating zombie tokens and buffing them with Lord of the Accursed, this deck excels at maintaining a steady stream of threats while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on creating a fast and aggressive board presence with low-cost Zombie creatures like Dread Wanderer, Cryptbreaker, and Metallic Mimic. Lord of the Accursed and Liliana's Mastery provide buffs to the entire Zombie army, while Relentless Dead and Diregraf Colossus offer recursion and token generation. Removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness help control the opponent's board while Dark Salvation can act as both removal and a finisher. Westvale Abbey can also provide a powerful threat in Ormendahl, Profane Prince.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a relentless stream of aggressive creatures, utilizing the synergy between zombie tribal cards and anthem effects to increase their power and resilience. The strategy involves filling up the board with low-cost creatures and then leveraging their abilities to create value and maintain pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of removal spells helps to clear the way for attacks while Westvale Abbey provides a powerful threat and alternate win condition.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively flood the board with low-cost Zombie creatures and then use them in combination with Lord of the Accursed, Metallic Mimic, and Liliana's Mastery to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful and synergistic horde. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the opponent's creatures and clear a path for the Zombie onslaught. The mana base consists entirely of Swamps, allowing for consistent casting of the deck's black spells. Westvale Abbey provides a late-game win condition by transforming into Ormendahl, Profane Prince.

This deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence with efficient and aggressive creatures like Cryptbreaker, Diregraf Colossus, and Metallic Mimic. Using cards like Dark Salvation and Lord of the Accursed to pump up the team and overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to deal with threats. Liliana's Mastery provides additional creature buffs, while Relentless Dead provides recursion. Westvale Abbey can be used as a win condition if needed. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and relentless in attacking the opponent.

The main focus of this mono black aggro deck is to overwhelm your opponent with a fast and relentless stream of zombie creatures. By utilizing cards like Cryptbreaker and Diregraf Colossus to generate tokens, along with Lord of the Accursed and Metallic Mimic to boost their power, you can quickly build a solid board presence. With cards like Dark Salvation and Liliana's Mastery to control the board and pump up your zombies, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and close out games quickly.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive creatures and utilizing synergy between zombies to create a powerful board presence. The deck utilizes cards like Cryptbreaker and Dread Wanderer to generate card advantage and fill the board with creatures. Lord of the Accursed and Liliana's Mastery provide anthem effects to boost the team, while Dark Salvation and Grasp of Darkness help to control the opponent's board. The key strategy is to maintain pressure on the opponent while efficiently managing resources to secure victory.

This deck focuses on using low-cost, aggressive black creatures to swarm the opponent and exert early pressure on them. By utilizing cards like Cryptbreaker and Metallic Mimic to quickly build a board presence, along with the resiliency of creatures like Dread Wanderer and Relentless Dead, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to establish their own game plan. Cards like Dark Salvation and Lord of the Accursed provide additional support and ways to pump up the team, while removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness help to clear the way for attacks.

The main focus of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to flood the board with low-cost creatures like Relentless Dead, Dread Wanderer, and Cryptbreaker, while using lords like Lord of the Accursed and Liliana's Mastery to pump them up. Dark Salvation and Grasp of Darkness serve as efficient removal spells to clear the way for your creatures to attack. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless stream of threats and create a powerful board presence to quickly close out the game.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive zombie creatures. By utilizing cards like Dread Wanderer, Cryptbreaker, and Metallic Mimic to create a fast and powerful board presence, the deck aims to apply pressure early and often. Cards like Dark Salvation and Liliana's Mastery help to buff and protect the creatures, while removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push are included to clear any obstacles in the way. The inclusion of Westvale Abbey offers a powerful late-game win condition if needed.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and zombie synergies. By flooding the board with creatures like Cryptbreaker, Dread Wanderer, and Metallic Mimic, the deck can quickly build up a strong presence. Cards like Dark Salvation and Liliana's Mastery provide additional in-game advantages by creating zombie tokens and boosting creature stats. Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push offer removal options to control the board. The endgame can be reached by transforming Westvale Abbey into Ormendahl, Profane Prince for a powerful finish.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using a combination of low-cost creatures and zombie synergy. By generating tokens, buffing them with lords, and disrupting opponents with removal spells, this deck aims to establish a strong board presence and close out games quickly through efficient damage output. The inclusion of cards like Cryptbreaker and Liliana's Mastery enhances the zombie theme, allowing for both card advantage and increased power on the battlefield.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by removing threats and gaining life with cards like Fatal Push, Never / Return, and Gifted Aetherborn. It also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Sorin, Grim Nemesis to pressure the opponent and generate card advantage. The deck aims to stabilize the board with cards like Flaying Tendrils and Kalitas, Traitor of Ghet before closing out the game with powerful finishers like Linvala, the Preserver or Westvale Abbey. Overall, the strategy revolves around out-valuing the opponent and controlling the game until victory.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of aggressive creatures while utilizing cards like Cryptbreaker, Liliana's Mastery, and Dark Salvation to generate incremental advantage and strengthen the board. The Orzhov color combination allows for a mix of creature aggression and removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness, providing both offense and defense. By combining a strong creature base with removal and pump spells, this deck aims to quickly outpace the opponent and secure victory through relentless pressure.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on aggressive early-game plays with cards like Cryptbreaker, Dread Wanderer, and Wayward Servant. It utilizes a zombie tribal theme with cards like Lord of the Accursed, Diregraf Colossus, and Dark Salvation to create a strong board presence. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Declaration in Stone to control the opponent's board. Moreover, it has a splash of white for cards like Shambling Vent and Cast Out to provide additional versatility. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive zombie army while maintaining board control.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through removal spells, hand disruption, and powerful planeswalkers. It aims to control the board by removing threats and out valuing the opponent with cards like Gonti and Liliana. The deck also has a strong finisher in Glorybringer and Walking Ballista to close out the game. It utilizes a mix of removal, board wipes, and creature threats to maintain control of the game and secure victory.

This deck focuses on playing powerful creatures with strong abilities quickly in order to overwhelm the opponent and deal large amounts of damage in a short amount of time. It utilizes energy generation and efficient removal spells to control the board and maintain momentum. By using a combination of aggressive creatures and versatile spells, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and dictate the pace of the match, forcing the opponent to react and making it difficult for them to establish their own game plan.
